verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and the brethren <S%G80><s%> who were throughout <S%G2596><s%> Judea <S%G2453><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when <S%G3753><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> came <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were circumcised <S%G4061><s%> took <S%G1252><s%> issue <S%G1252><s%> with him,
saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You went <S%G1525><s%> to uncircumcised <S%G203><s%> men <S%G435><s%> and ate <S%G4906><s%> with them."
But Peter <S%G4074><s%> began <S%G757><s%> [speaking] and [proceeded] to explain <S%G1620><s%> to them in orderly <S%G2517><s%> sequence, <S%G2517><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"I was in the city <S%G4172><s%> of Joppa <S%G2445><s%> praying; <S%G4336><s%> and in a trance <S%G1611><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> a vision, <S%G3705><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> object <S%G4632><s%> coming <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet <S%G3607><s%> lowered <S%G2524><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G746><s%> from the sky; <S%G3772><s%> and it came <S%G2064><s%> right <S%G891><s%> down to me,

and when I had fixed <S%G816><s%> my gaze <S%G816><s%> upon it and was observing <S%G2657><s%> it I saw <S%G3708><s%> the four-footed animals <S%G5074><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the wild <S%G2342><s%> beasts <S%G2342><s%> and the crawling <S%G2062><s%> creatures <S%G2062><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air. <S%G3772><s%>
"And I also <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, 'Arise, <S%G450><s%> Peter; <S%G4074><s%> kill <S%G2380><s%> and eat. <S%G2068><s%>'

"But I said, <S%G3004><s%> 'By no <S%G3365><s%> means, <S%G3365><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for nothing <S%G3763><s%> unholy <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> has ever <S%G3763><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>'

"But a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> time, <S%G1208><s%> 'What <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> longer consider <S%G2840><s%> unholy. <S%G2839><s%>'
"And this <S%G3778><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> three <S%G5151><s%> times, <S%G5151><s%> and everything <S%G537><s%> was drawn <S%G385><s%> back <S%G3825><s%> up into the sky. <S%G3772><s%>

"And behold, <S%G2400><s%> at that moment <S%G1824><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> appeared <S%G2186><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> we were [staying,] having been sent <S%G649><s%> to me from Caesarea. <S%G2542><s%>

"And the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> me to go <S%G4905><s%> with them without <S%G3367><s%> misgivings. <S%G1252><s%> And these <S%G3778><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G2064><s%> with me, and we entered <S%G1525><s%> the man's house. <S%G3624><s%>

"And he reported <S%G518><s%> to us how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G3708><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in his house, <S%G3624><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Send <S%G649><s%> to Joppa, <S%G2445><s%> and have Simon, <S%G4613><s%> who is also called <S%G1941><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> brought <S%G3343><s%> here; <S%G3343><s%>
and he shall speak <S%G2980><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> to you by which <S%G3739><s%> you will be saved, <S%G4982><s%> you and all <S%G3956><s%> your household. <S%G3624><s%>'
"And as I began <S%G757><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> upon them, just <S%G5618><s%> as [He did] upon us at the beginning. <S%G746><s%>

"And I remembered <S%G3403><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> He used to say, <S%G3004><s%> 'John <S%G2491><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water, <S%G5204><s%> but you shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>'

"If <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to them the same <S%G2470><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> as [He gave] to us also <S%G2532><s%> after believing <S%G4100><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> was I that I could <S%G1415><s%> stand <S%G2967><s%> in God's way <S%G2967><s%>?"

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> they quieted <S%G2270><s%> down, <S%G2270><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Well <S%G686><s%> then, <S%G686><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has granted <S%G1325><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the repentance <S%G3341><s%> [that leads] to life. <S%G2222><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were scattered <S%G1289><s%> because <S%G575><s%> of the persecution <S%G2347><s%> that arose <S%G1096><s%> in connection <S%G1909><s%> with Stephen <S%G4736><s%> made <S%G1330><s%> their way <S%G1330><s%> to Phoenicia <S%G5403><s%> and Cyprus <S%G2954><s%> and Antioch, <S%G490><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> to Jews <S%G2453><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>

But there were some <S%G5100><s%> of them, men <S%G435><s%> of Cyprus <S%G2953><s%> and Cyrene, <S%G2956><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Antioch <S%G490><s%> and [began] speaking <S%G2980><s%> to the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> was with them, and a large <S%G4183><s%> number <S%G706><s%> who believed <S%G4100><s%> turned <S%G1994><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And the news <S%G3056><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them reached <S%G191><s%> the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and they sent <S%G1821><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> off <S%G1821><s%> to Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

Then when he had come <S%G3854><s%> and witnessed <S%G3708><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> he rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> and [began] to encourage <S%G3870><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> with resolute <S%G4286><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to remain <S%G4357><s%> [true] to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

for he was a good <S%G18><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and of faith. <S%G4102><s%> And considerable <S%G2425><s%> numbers <S%G3793><s%> were brought <S%G4369><s%> to the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And he left <S%G1831><s%> for Tarsus <S%G5019><s%> to look <S%G327><s%> for Saul; <S%G4569><s%>

and when he had found <S%G2147><s%> him, he brought <S%G71><s%> him to Antioch. <S%G490><s%> And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that for an entire <S%G3650><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> they met <S%G4863><s%> with the church, <S%G1577><s%> and taught <S%G1321><s%> considerable <S%G2425><s%> numbers; <S%G3793><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were first <S%G4416><s%> called <S%G5537><s%> Christians <S%G5546><s%> in Antioch. <S%G490><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> at this <S%G3778><s%> time <S%G2250><s%> some prophets <S%G4396><s%> came <S%G2718><s%> down <S%G2718><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to Antioch. <S%G490><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus <S%G13><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up and [began] to indicate <S%G4591><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that there would <S%G3195><s%> certainly <S%G3195><s%> be a great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the world. <S%G3625><s%> And this <S%G3748><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> in the [reign] of Claudius. <S%G2804><s%>

And in the proportion <S%G2531><s%> that any <S%G5100><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> had <S%G2141><s%> means, <S%G2141><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> of them determined <S%G3724><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> [a contribution] for the relief <S%G1248><s%> of the brethren <S%G80><s%> living <S%G2730><s%> in Judea. <S%G2453><s%>
And this <S%G3739><s%> they did, <S%G4160><s%> sending <S%G649><s%> it in charge <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5495><s%> of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and Saul <S%G4569><s%> to the elders. <S%G4245><s%>
